message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is around $8,000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $20,000 is a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $12,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.
